content.question: In the long term, which of the following contributed the LEAST to improving the conditions described in the passage?

choices.label: The United States passage of the Marshall Plan
The passage of increased social welfare programs
The growth of the European Economic Community
The restrictions placed on immigration from former colonies

content.answer: The restrictions placed on immigration from former colonies

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
